SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_SPONSORSHIP_CANCEL_PROJECT_CONSTITUENCYCODES
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: BETHESDA\msellers
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SPONSORSHIP_CANCEL_PROJECT_CONSTITUENCYCODES ( @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier ) as begin -- sets the DATETO=today of the constituency code record that matches the -- constituentid and either of the constituency codes: Prospect Project Sponsor or Project Sponsor update dbo.CONSTITUENCY set DATETO = GETDATE() where CONSTITUENTID = @CONSTITUENTID and CONSTITUENCYCODEID IN ( select ID from dbo.CONSTITUENCYCODE where lower([DESCRIPTION]) in ('project sponsor', 'prospect project sponsor') ) and DATETO is NULL end
